name: plex-prerolls
description: Plex Prerolls is a self-hosted tool to manage and randomize video clips as prerolls in Plex Media Server. It includes custom rules and scheduling through a simple UI.
features: Preroll management: Organize and manage video clips to play before movies in Plex.
Randomization: Randomly select prerolls from your collection for variety in each viewing.
Scheduling rules: Configure prerolls to play based on date, season, or custom schedules.
Multiple collections: Create separate preroll collections for different occasions or themes.
Plex integration: Automatically update Plex server configuration with selected prerolls.
Web interface: Manage prerolls through an intuitive web-based control panel.
Preview playback: Preview preroll videos before adding them to rotation.
Weight settings: Assign probability weights to prerolls for more or less frequent playback.
Holiday themes: Automatically switch to holiday-themed prerolls based on calendar dates.
File validation: Verify preroll files are compatible with Plex before adding to rotation.
Backup and restore: Export and import preroll configurations for easy migration or backup.
Activity logging: Track which prerolls have been played and when for rotation management.
